author: Hemant Mehta
title: Christian Evangelist: Don’t Let Dating Get in the Way of Your Relationship With God
text:
« Creationists Are Holding a World Religions Conference To Teach Christians How to Fix the Others About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
